header.title: LIFE ETERNAL AND ITS WORK: Revealed From The Heavenly Side

central_thesis: Life Eternal is the singular, incorporeal, divine, and perfect reality, composed of fundamental 'Life-containing Qualities.' Humanity, as 'Divine Sons' (the 'I Am'), is inherently identical to this Life Eternal, possessing all its qualities and consciousness. The operative purpose for the 'Qualified Life of Man' is to consciously realize this intrinsic divinity, act as an 'Acting Cause' and personal 'Saviour' to maintain created forms, and reveal the 'Truth of Being' from the heavenly side, thereby achieving salvation through the dissolution of false beliefs and the 'outer personality.'

structure_content.summary: Establishes that all revelations about Life Eternal originate from its own incorporeal side, emphasizing its self-knowledge and the role of 'the word' as a channel for divine messages to humanity, aiming for 'perfect and complete success' in revelation.

structure_content.chapter_title: CHAPTER I: THE ONE WHOLE LIFE ETERNAL
structure_content.summary: Defines Life Eternal as the singular, perfect, incorporeal, and changeless reality, composed of 'Life-containing Qualities' (e.g., Beauty, Good, Honesty, Intelligence). These qualities are equally life-containing, precisely united, and indivisible. Consciousness is presented as an eternal, whole, and divine reality, intrinsically linked to the One Life Eternal.

structure_content.chapter_title: CHAPTER II: THE ONE LIFE COMPOSED OF DIVINE AND ETERNAL QUALITIES IS A LIFE FOR EVERY ONE AND EVERY ONE'S LIFE IS DIVINE AND ETERNAL
structure_content.summary: Reveals Life Eternal as the absolute Life-source, existing in 'Three Equal Folds'—God, the Universe, and Man—united as a 'Threefold Life' (One Is Three and Three Are One). This 'Holy Trinity' signifies perfect equality, unity, and oneness of Life among these Divine Beings, establishing that every individual's life is divine and eternal.

structure_content.chapter_title: CHAPTER III: EXPLANATION ABOUT THE WORK OF THE THREEFOLD LIFE
structure_content.summary: Explains that the Divine Three's incorporeal purpose is to reveal Life through created forms. The 'Trinity Man' is tasked with maintaining all created human forms in space, with each 'Qualified Life' (individual 'I Am') acting as a unique 'cause' for this maintenance, possessing powerful Life to preserve originality and connection.

structure_content.chapter_title: CHAPTER IV: THE EXPLANATION ABOUT THE GIVING OF LIFE FOR QUALIFIED LIFE OF MAN
structure_content.summary: Details that the 'I Am Life' of each 'Qualified Man' is a precise portion of the 'Whole Life of Man,' bestowed by the Father, and composed of all 'Life-containing Qualities' in equal, perfectly united quantities. This inherently divine and eternal 'little Life' identifies the Son of Man as an Immortal Being, reflecting the Giver's divine nature.

structure_content.chapter_title: CHAPTER V: THE MANFOLD IS OUR HEAVENLY MANSION
structure_content.summary: Describes the 'Manfold' as the Father's 'Heavenly Mansion,' the eternal home where all 'Divine Sons' (Qualified Lives) reside as 'Living Parts' of the 'Whole Life of Man.' Here, each 'I Am' retains its divine identity, is equally loved, and consciously experiences a unified Heaven, inseparable from the Father's Fold.

Asserts that Life itself is the worker, and every 'Divine Son' has a sacred, unique duty to perform for the Father: to maintain created form man by revealing Divine Qualities from Heaven. This work, including the 'cause work' of Christ Jesus, is done consciously and in harmony with changeless Qualities, enabling the 'I Am' to reveal omnipresence and omnipotence.

structure_content.chapter_title: CHAPTER VII: THE LIFE OF ALL SONS IS COMPOSED OF IDENTICAL QUALITIES, SO THE IDENTITY OF ALL SONS IS PRECISELY THE SAME
structure_content.summary: Reiterates that the 'I Am Identity' is formed by its 'Life-containing Qualities,' and all 'Divine Sons' share this identical life and consciousness. Heaven is defined as the immediate Bliss, Glory, Happiness, Harmony, Joy, and Peace derived from conscious Life, enjoyed equally by the Divine Three and all Sons, making it a conscious, real, and eternal Kingdom.

Consolidates that Life, Consciousness, Heaven, Unity, and Divinity are all one. Life Eternal is a Threefold Life (God, Universe, Man) equally possessing life, consciousness, and heaven. The Trinity signifies perfect Unity and Oneness. The 'Trinity Man' gives Life to Sons as acting causes for the 'One Religious Fellowship Association' (All Sons Church).

Posits that Life Divine self-reveals through the human 'I Am,' which acts as 'Acting Cause' and 'Saviour.' Special activities like 'Author,' 'Revelator,' and 'Teacher' are expressions of the 'I Am's' divine function, enabling it to identify itself and fulfill its purpose through 'good activities.'

States that eternal truth is revealed in fragments through 'the word,' providing enlightenment on Life's immortality and incorporeal nature. This truth, delivered by the 'I Am' as Author and Revelator, aims to satisfy humanity's search for understanding and is illuminated by 'Quality Light' within one's Life.

Proposes a 'One Religious Fellowship Association' based on the 'true teaching about The One Life Eternal.' Its foundational teachings emphasize Life's oneness, the eternal divinity of 'Divine Sons,' their role as 'Acting Causes' and 'Saviours,' and the impossibility of dissociating real life, aiming to unite all people in religious worship.

structure_content.chapter_title: The Purpose of Church Services Is Salvation
structure_content.summary: Explains that services aim for 'salvation and benefit' by reading 'revealed truth,' displacing 'falsities' and allowing the 'I Am' to save from sin. This process, facilitated by divinely informed Readers, imparts comfort, healing, and a 'holy mood' through the 'evangelical meaning' of the words.

Provides examples of prayers, including a re-interpreted Lord's Prayer, emphasizing direct communication with the 'Heavenly Father' and internal recognition of divine presence. It highlights the teaching of 'ALL SONS' or 'ALL LIFE ETERNAL' as the core Christian teaching, reflecting Christ's original message.

Asserts that 'the word' is a divine invention by Life Eternal for communicating its immortality. The 'ABC teaching' of Life Divine begins with reading, with the 'I Am' acting as both Reader and Teacher, making the process of understanding and self-realization effective for salvation through impressing omnipresence.

Describes the pedagogical path of self-realization: dropping false beliefs through reading, study, meditation, observation. The 'Life' (omnipresent thinker) teaches good belief, thinking, understanding, knowledge, and realization, ultimately revealing itself as a 'Living Teacher and Saviour' until all lessons are learned.

Redefines 'Saviour' as the 'I Am' of each human man, identical in saving power to the 'Life of Christ Jesus.' It explicitly states Christ's Life 'finished its work and merged,' thus no longer actively saving for earth conditions. The individual 'I Am' continuously acts as 'Maintainer' and 'Saviour' for its human form, healing it from 'false beliefs.'

structure_content.chapter_title: How Life Divine of Each Human Man as Saviour Works in Heaven or in Eternity
structure_content.summary: Explains that the 'I Am' (Life Divine) of each human works from Heaven/eternity to liberate and comfort its human form on earth. This work, including healing and saving from 'false beliefs,' is continuously and rapidly transmitted, with the human body serving as a channel. Success depends on the human's 'obedience' to divine demands.

structure_content.chapter_title: It is False Belief that the Human Personality Needs to be Saved From
structure_content.summary: Identifies the core problem as 'false beliefs' (the 'outer personality'), particularly that Life resides in flesh or that the body can sin. These illusions abuse the body and must 'vanish.' Salvation is the gradual process of discarding these false beliefs, allowing the 'I Am' to manifest health, holiness, and divinity by turning to one's Life Divine.

structure_content.chapter_title: Thousand Years is as One Day
structure_content.summary: Contextualizes the timeline of salvation, stating that 'a thousand years is as one day' to Life Eternal. It rejects the belief of Christ Jesus saving after merging and asserts that each individual 'I Am' is responsible for its own salvation from the 'false dream' of living in human form, being sick, or sinning, leading to a 'Goal of Fulfillment.'

Reinterprets Jesus Christ as an 'example' of full salvation attained through 'complete obedience to Divine Qualities,' using his body as a channel until his Life merged. It asserts that every human personality must follow this example, letting their own 'Life Divine' be their perfect 'Saviour' and guide to the 'Goal of Fulfillment,' becoming an example for others.

Affirms the promise of universal salvation, where the 'I Am' of each person guides the human body towards the 'Goal of Fulfillment.' This process involves gradually abandoning 'little false gods' (worldly entanglements and false beliefs). The 'I Am' provides comfort and leads towards freedom, ensuring complete salvation as the human form reaches its destined goal.

structure_content.chapter_title: Form Instrument or Channel for Salvation, Revelation and Glorification
structure_content.summary: Concludes that the human body is designed as an 'instrument or channel' for the 'I Am' to achieve 'salvation, revelation and glorification' of Life Divine. By obeying the 'I Am,' the outer personality's falsities vanish, allowing the saving work to complete. The author claims divine authority to reveal this truth about the 'Saviour' and Life Eternal, which is an open book to the 'I Am.'

key_concepts.definition: The singular, whole, perfect, incorporeal, divine, and unchangeable reality that is the source and substance of all existence. It eternally possesses its own Consciousness and constitutes Heaven.

The fundamental, equally life-containing, precise, changeless, and indivisible attributes that constitute Life Eternal. These include Beauty, Good, Honesty, Intelligence, Knowledge, Law, Light, Love, Mind, Power, Purity, Right, Soul, Truth, Will, and Wisdom, and are the means by which the 'I Am' identifies itself.

The manifestation of the One Life Eternal in three equal and unified 'Folds': God, the Universe, and Man. These are qualitatively and quantitatively identical, representing perfect unity, oneness, and equality among Divine Beings, expressed as 'One Is Three and Three Are One.'

key_concepts.term: I Am Identity / Qualified Life of Man / Divine Son
key_concepts.definition: The individual's inherent divine self, a portion of the 'Whole Life Eternal of Man.' This 'I Am' is identical in qualities, consciousness, and saving power to the Life of Christ Jesus, residing eternally in the 'Manfold' and acting as the personal 'Maintainer' and 'Saviour' for its human form.

The eternal, incorporeal spiritual realm within the 'Trinity Man' where all 'Divine Sons' (Qualified Lives) eternally reside. It is their 'Eternal Home,' where they are conscious, loved equally by the Father, and enjoy a unified Heaven.

The eternal, whole, divine, changeless, and indivisible reality inherent to Life Eternal. It is the self-awareness of Life Eternal and its qualities, equally shared by the Divine Three and all 'Divine Sons,' serving as the basis for divine identity and all enjoyments of Heaven.

The non-physical, infinite, limitless, boundless, and measureless nature of Life Eternal, its Consciousness, and Heaven. This term is used to emphasize their non-material reality and essential spiritual dimension, distinct from physical form.

The operative function of the 'I Am' of each human man. The 'I Am' continuously works from Heaven to maintain, heal, and save the human form from 'false beliefs' (outer personality) and sin, acting as the sole and sufficient agent for individual salvation, paralleling the original 'cause work' of Christ Jesus.

Illusory perceptions and errors, such as the belief that Life resides in flesh, that the human body can sin, or that sickness is real. The 'outer personality' embodies these falsities, which are external to the true 'I Am' and must be transcended or dissolved for salvation and true self-realization.

The ultimate state of complete salvation, where the saving work of the 'I Am' is finished, all 'false beliefs' have vanished, and the human body is released. This signifies the merger of the individual 'I Am' with the Whole Life Eternal, returning to its eternal state of oneness with Consciousness and Heaven.

practical_system.description: The practical system is an internal, contemplative, and cognitive form of spiritual alchemy aimed at self-realization and self-salvation. The 'magician' (the 'I Am') operates by consciously recognizing its inherent identity as a 'Divine Son,' an 'Acting Cause,' and 'Saviour,' composed of all 'Life-containing Qualities.' This involves aligning the 'human personality' (the 'outer self' prone to 'false beliefs') with the 'I Am's' divine truth. The core 'operative' work is to dissolve 'false beliefs' through study, meditation, and conscious affirmation of divine truth, allowing the 'I Am' to manifest healing, maintenance, and liberation from worldly 'errors.' The human body functions as a 'channel' through which the 'I Am' performs its divine work.
tools: The 'revealed truth' contained within the book, serving as a 'textbook' for understanding the metaphysical system.
'The word' (language, written and spoken) as the primary medium for revelation, teaching, and conscious affirmation, enabling the 'I Am' to communicate truth.
Consciousness itself, recognized as eternal reality and the faculty through which the 'I Am' knows and manifests its divine identity and qualities.
The inherent 'Life-containing Qualities' (e.g., Love, Wisdom, Power) within the 'I Am,' which are to be recognized, cultivated, and expressed as operative forces.
The human body, utilized as a 'temple' or 'channel' for the 'I Am' to manifest divine activities, healing, revelation, and glorification in the physical realm.
rituals: Dedicated reading and study of the 'revealed truth' (the book itself and similar metaphysical texts) to internalize the nature of Life Eternal and the 'I Am.'
Regular meditation to consciously realize one's divine identity, perceive the 'demands for obedience' from the Life Divine, and align with its inherent Qualities.
Recitation of specific prayers (e.g., the re-interpreted Lord's Prayer) that affirm immanent divinity and oneness with the Father, expressing gratitude for Life, Consciousness, and Heaven.
Engagement in 'Honest Business' and 'good activities' as a conscious expression of the 'Life-containing Qualities' within one's 'I Am,' demonstrating divine will in action.
The continuous process of shedding 'false beliefs' of the 'outer personality' through conscious choice and alignment with the 'Life Divine,' acting as one's personal 'Saviour.'

relevant_quotes.text: Life eternal lives consciously, and enjoys Heaven in full on the incorporeal side. Life knows its own Life, and is conscious in its Consciousness, and enjoys Heaven.

The names of the Life-containing Qualities which are the ingredients in Life Eternal may be alphabetically arranged as follows: Beauty, Good, Honesty, Intelligence, Knowledge, Law, Light, Love, Mind, Power, Purity, Right, Soul, Truth, Will and Wisdom.
Thus, the Life of Christ Jesus was not the only Son in Heaven, for WE ALL AS THE QUALIFIED LIFE OF MAN ARE SONS IN HEAVEN!

The One Life Eternal is from eternity a Threefold Life, so "Threefold Life" refers to the One Life Eternal... in the One Life, or in the One Quantity of Life, the Life of God, and the Life of the Universe, and the Life of Man live in perfect unity and oneness as a Threefold Life.

The I Am, or the Life (of the human man) consists in an equal and precise quantity of quality from each Quality which is in reality life-containing and thus belongs to the Life as its Life-containing ingredients; but it is in the perfect unity and oneness of them that the Life is what it is.
So divine identity is Consciousness for every Living Man and for All Life in Heaven.
The Life of Christ Jesus knew also, that Life Divine of every man was just like its own and enjoyed the Kingdom of Heaven exactly like its own.

The I Am (of each human man) as Acting Cause and also as Saviour, is conscious of being perfect Acting Cause and perfect Saviour; and therefore continuously achieves both the cause work and the saving work with perfect ease.

The teaching that the Life of Christ Jesus can save, even now after it is finished with working for earth conditions and has merged, is impossible. I do not know from where this teaching came. It may be that it came from some misinterpretation of the Bible Word.
The human body was given for the purpose of being used by the I Am as a temple or channel for revelation and glorification of Life Divine.
The I Am of each person shall have finished its work and merged. And Life Eternal is as it from eternity was with its Consciousness and Heaven.

critical_analysis.relevance: This work represents a unique synthesis of Christian terminology with pantheistic/panentheistic New Thought metaphysics, advocating for a radical internal self-divinization. It is highly relevant to Christian Esotericism and Gnosticism by reinterpreting Christ's role from an external saviour to an 'example' of an inherent 'I Am' within every individual. The emphasis on an incorporeal, quality-based reality and consciousness as the ultimate divine identity aligns with Hermetic principles of 'as above, so below' and Neoplatonic emanations. The concept of the 'I Am' as an 'Acting Cause' that maintains and heals through conscious realization resonates with mental magic and the power of intention found in various occult traditions. Its direct rejection of traditional atonement theology and external saviorship marks it as a distinct, self-empowering magical philosophy, emphasizing the practitioner's immanent divine authority and the internal work of 'shedding false beliefs' to achieve 'salvation' (self-liberation and merging with Life Eternal).
critical_analysis.target_audience: Individuals seeking an esoteric, self-actualizing interpretation of Christian concepts, particularly those interested in New Thought, Christian Science, or Gnostic-leaning spiritual paths. It appeals to practitioners of internal and mental magic who focus on consciousness, self-realization, and the inherent divinity of the individual, rather than external ritualistic practices or traditional religious dogma. The verbose and repetitive style, coupled with the abstract metaphysical concepts, suggests an audience already familiar with esoteric thought or highly dedicated to philosophical self-inquiry.
